Room.Name: Bottom of the Stairs
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the bottom of the stairs in the Boar's Arse Pub.
Room.LongDescription: As you come down the stairs, the bouncers smile and wave to you. Evidently you have given them the right answers to their questions. However, these guys have short memories. If you go to the pub and try to come back, they will act like they don't know you.
